definition: to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize

sentences.english: Synthetic method of rosin acid modified terephthalic unsaturated polyester resin (TUPR) was studied.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了松香酸改性对苯型不饱和聚酯树脂的合成方法。

sentences.english: The results show that the premixing process improved the polyester sizing efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，预混合工艺能提高聚酯树脂的施胶效率。

sentences.english: Thixotropic resin based on ortho-phthalic acid.
sentences.chinese: 触变型，邻苯型基体的不饱和聚酯树脂。

sentences.english: This article discussed the application of 191 unsaturated resin at oil well.
sentences.chinese: 研究了191不饱和聚酯树脂在油井上应用的配方。

sentences.english: Monomer-free unsaturated polyester resin with good heat resistance and electric properties.
sentences.chinese: 固体不饱和聚酯树脂，具有良好的耐热性和电性能。

sentences.english: SC-P1092 is pultrusion resin molding with o-type unsaturated polyester resin.
sentences.chinese: P1092树脂是拉挤成型用邻苯型不饱和聚酯树脂。

sentences.english: It is oxidized to form terephthalic acid for polyester resins and fibers.
sentences.chinese: 它可氧化生成对苯二甲酸用于生产聚酯树脂和纤维。

sentences.english: LH-P1092 is pultrusion resin molding with o-type unsaturated polyester resin.
sentences.chinese: P1092树脂是拉挤成型用邻苯型不饱和聚酯树脂。

sentences.english: The roughening process of unsaturated polyester resins and its technological criterion were described.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了不饱和聚酯树脂的粗化工艺流程及各工艺规范。

sentences.english: Then the polyester resin can fully cure.
sentences.chinese: 这样，聚酯树脂就可以完全固化。

sentences.english: DCPD type unsaturated polyester resin prepared by using semi condensation polymerization method is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 本文用半缩聚法合成双环戊二烯型不饱和聚酯树脂。

definition: phenolic aldehyde/phenolic resin (used to manufacture bakelite)
